Definition: Given an English language product review, determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the product's review has positive tone. Bad review is one where the tone of product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: The book is very well written, however I am having a hard time getting past the way it ends. It feels like there are five books all jumbled together with no completion anywhere.
This would be adorable if all eight balls stayed in place; however, one keeps popping open.
This has work perfectly so far. It does exactly what it says it does. Very easy setup and worked first time.

This tool works well as long as you don't get too creative thinking how you want to use it. I gave it 4 stars because sometimes my coffee is weak, and when this happens, we run the water through again in a few seconds but not sure. But overall, it's still much faster than our old coffee maker. Not sure why all of appliances can leak so frequently. It makes good coffee too. If they could make them more watertight, I'd recommend them. So far, no leaks at all.

This product is a rip-off. Save your money. I have had the worst headache and stomach ache ever since taking this product. I am in so much pain. You will go right to your health club if you want that feeling of having just went on an acid trip. Please save yourself the agony - don't buy any products from Pure Bliss Nutritions! They are scammers who would sell poison even though there was no evidence it has harmed humans. The ingredients are completely untested. Do not buy.

I received this item well packaged and without any issues. It took about 3 weeks to arrive and the packaging was quite good. The size of the pillow is similar to a regular sized sleeping bag. The material itself seems high quality as well. The only thing that wasn't great about this product, in my opinion, for me, was how it felt between my ears. Overall though, I'm satisfied with it. It's exactly what I'd want from an item.

This product is much smaller than it looked. It only fits about a pack of cigarettes. If you're looking for something more substantial, look somewhere else. You can barely get one to fit between your butt and ass. The price was good though, so I'm happy with it. But I should have read the measurements better.

This is by far the worst thing I ordered from Amazon. And it shipped fast, so thats nice. However when using it, you cant adjust it. Once on your ear, there must be no way. It was not adjustable at all. It's just really weird looking and makes me feel uncomfortable. Dont get this. Trust me, spend a few extra bucks for something better. My friends tried mine out, she had to take hers off.
